justification: Shows some awareness that B can trade from QB depth and likes young ascending players, but ignores B’s preference for possession WRs and injured buy-lows. Asking B to give up a Tier 1, low-variance QB (Reed) when they need wins is misaligned. The ‘QB-WR stack’ claim is unsubstantiated, and ‘injury-buy QBs’ is incoherent. Rationale is brief and partially inaccurate.
